identity.mission: Create a warm, emotional, and interactive wedding experience that feels like a cozy cafe visit.
principles: Fusion over Imitation: Mix digital interactivity with physical warmth.
Emotion First: Every scroll should feel inviting.
Content is King: The invitation text is the hero.
Negative Space: Allow the cafe background to breathe.

cafe_interior.alt: Cozy cafe interior with warm hanging lights and blurred background
cafe_interior.usage: Fixed background for the entire site

wooden_door.usage: Split in half for the entrance animation

structure.homepage: Fixed background + Scrollable Overlay + Fixed Bottom Bar
structure.registry: Scrollable Grid of Cards + Fixed Bottom Bar

DoorEntrance.description: Two div panels covering the screen. On scroll, they translate X outwards (left panel to -100%, right panel to 100%).

specs.sound: Trigger HTML5 audio on first scroll interaction

FloatingSection.description: Transparent container with blurred backdrop for readability over the cafe background.

MenuBar.description: Fixed bottom navigation bar with floating icons.

specs.icons: Lucide React icons (Phone, MapPin, MailOpen, Gift/Home)

RegistryItem.description: Card displaying gift item, price, and contribution progress.

guidelines: Use spring animations for door opening (stiffness: 100, damping: 30).
Fade in floating sections as they enter viewport.
Hover effects on menu icons: scale 1.1 + slight rotation.
Modals should slide up from bottom (AnimatePresence).

accessibility.contrast: Ensure text on transparent cards has high contrast against the cafe background.
accessibility.reduced_motion: Disable door animation if prefers-reduced-motion is true.
accessibility.aria: Add aria-labels to all icon-only buttons in the menu.

instructions_to_main_agent: 2. Door Logic: Create a 'DoorOverlay' component. Use 'useScroll' to track scroll progress. Map scroll (0 to 300px) to door translation (0% to 100%).
3. Sound: Add an <audio> element. Play it ONLY after user interaction (scroll) to avoid browser autoplay policies.
4. Database: Ensure MongoDB schemas for 'RSVP' and 'RegistryItem' are created.
5. Validation: RSVP form must check if date > July 24, 2026.
6. Styling: Use the defined color palette in tailwind.config.js. Extend the theme with 'warm-brown', 'cream', etc.
7. Icons: Use Lucide icons: Phone (Contact), MapPin (Location), MailOpen (RSVP), Gift (Registry), Home (Back).
UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES_FOR_MAIN_AGENT: Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients
Don't make generic centered layouts, simplistic gradients, and uniform styling.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur)
You MUST NOT apply universal transition. Eg: transition: all. This results in breaking transforms. Always add transitions for specific interactive elements like button, input excluding transforms
You MUST NOT center align the app container, ie do not add .App { text-align: center; } in the css file. This disrupts the human natural reading flow of text
Always use modern button styles like pill-shaped, or sharp button with interaction animations & color relevant to the app style
